${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> The four essential ingredients of a holistic PSTN transformation strategy Question: what is the biggest challenge in a successful public switched telephone network (PSTN) transformation project?
- Finding skilled workers
- Maintaining forward progress
- Managing stakeholders
- Controlling execution
- All of the above
If you answered e), give yourself a pat on the back! Making a success of PSTN transformation can only be done with a holistic approach that understands and overcomes these 4 key challenges. This approach recognizes that PSTN transformation goes way beyond the technical. It must align business strategy with regulatory considerations and, above all, ensure customers continue to get the quality of service they expect from you.
Insight article: Go holistic to succeed with PSTN migration In this article, learn more about the challenges and discover the 4 essential ingredients of a holistic PSTN transformation strategy.
- PSTN migration is a business challenge, not a technical upgrade
- A holistic approach to migration optimizes OPEX, revenue, and efficiency
- Migration requires the right plan, capabilities, execution, and partners
